sections.heading: districts organized by proceedings in district court; formation; articles of association; contents
sections.text: A majority in interest of the owners in any contiguous body of swamp or overflowed lands in this state, situated in one or more counties in this state, may form a drainage district for the purpose of h

sections.heading: of incorporation, if properly drawn, may take the place of petition or application, and the statute defines what they shall contain
sections.text: Drainage Dist. No. 1 of Otoe and Johnson Counties v. Wilkins, 93 Neb. 567, 141 N.W. 151 (1913).
